topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a507556368723ddcb01600#post_54a507556368723ddcb01600
Enlarge what? The gif?

You might as well set the gif to be larger initially and shrink it, that preserves more of the quality

I don't know what to tell you about your resizing problem, all you need to do is click the tab and type whatever numbers you want to resize, and it's usually best to keep the aspect ratio on so the gif isn't skewed or stretched horribly.

of course ill still have steam cause my games are there but wont be buying anything from valve anymore, unless the game is on like 90% off sale

i hope GOG galaxy comes soon, and i hope they do something to help developing countries who cant afford to buy games priced in dollars

topics.body: Random thought: if we ever get to the point where we can just yank out someone's brain and put it in a new body, how would the brain react if it became conscious again while it was disconnected? Surely not well. I mean imagine waking up to nothing. No feeling, no vision, no anything.
